column5: We used to stay at the Red Dog Inn on our yearly trip and I have found that the place changed names and owners. Can anybody provide the new name and a number I can call for reservations?
If your talking about the one in Red Lake, Ontario, the new name is Norseman Inn @ 807-727-2858 Pooch

I know some people who stayed there in the past and didn't have favorable reports. I have heard some woke up with flat tires or other vandelism. I have heard of others losing gear. If you are referring to the one in International Falls/ Ft Francis, I would stay elsewhere.

Here is a repeat of what I put on another post. Cross over and stay in Fort Frances La Place Rendez-vous is a very nice place to stay and the price is a couple of dollars more but worth it.www.rendezvoushotel.com Hope this helps answer your questions
